Articles.Content:
Hi all,

i ve played ksp for over 2 weeks now and i really enjoy it but docking is hard.....

so i tried 2 instal mechjeb..

i've installed mechjeb 1.9.8 and it worked exept the a.s.s module and the ascent guidance.

so i tried 2 install mechjeb 2..

with some hickups i managed but there where 2 cases:

1. i had the mechjeb case but it wouldnt attach in the vab.

2. i had the mechjeb inside all of the normall command modules and the vab wouldnt let me click on some of the objects. and the vab wouldnt let me move things around.

how can i make mechjeb 2 work ?

i would like some help guys(and dont get too hard on the newby i still have 2 learn things )

thank you!!

1.9.8 is an old version. You shouldn't try to use it.

The version you want it 2.0.9 then replace the dll by rAmOn with the one posted by Sarbian. (It's a long story but the short of it is Sarbian is officially supporting MJ while rAmOn is on hiatus.) Here's a couple threads that hopefully you can navigate to get the right stuff:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12384-PART-0-21-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-9

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/47317-MechJeb-2-Patch-test-bed-release-%28September-9%29
